items.title: Step 1 - Search for Expertise
items.description: What skills do you need for your project? Type in the search to find a list of consultants with that skillset.

items.title: Step 2 - Select your Consultant
items.description: Search the list of consultants for the expertise you are looking for. Refine your search by skill, location, and expertise. Contact consultants and request a proposal for your project.

items.title: Step 3 - Get to Know you Session
items.description: Define scope, set expectations and delivery date with your consultant.

items.title: Step 4 - Receive a Quote
items.description: Your consultant will provide you with a quote so you know the exact cost. Confirm the quote and your consultant will begin the project.

items.title: Step 5 - The Work
items.description: Ongoing communications with your consultant as they work with you on completing your project.

items.title: Step 6 - Delivery
items.description: Your project is delivered and you will receive an invoice. Payment is collected.

items.title: Step 7 - Rate your Consultant
items.description: We take the quality of our consultants very seriously. Reward your consultant for their hard work by giving them a rating out of five.

items.title: Step 8 - Repeat
items.description: Continue working with your consultant for as many project as you like, or hire a new consultant with different areas of expertise.

items.title: Step 1 - Sign Up
items.description: Apply to become a certified consultant. Complete an online application. Once approved, you'll gain access to projects from our client community.

items.title: Step 2 - Create a Profile
items.description: Apply to become a certified consultant. Complete an online application. Once approved, you'll gain access to projects from our client community.

items.title: Step 3 - Profile Share
items.description: Your contact information will be shared with clients who are searching for someone with your expertise.
